text: Donald Walter Trautman (June 24, 1936 â€“ February 26, 2022) was an American Roman Catholic prelate. He was bishop of the Diocese of Erie in Western Pennsylvania from 1990 to 2011. He was an auxiliary bishop of the Diocese of Buffalo in Upstate New York from 1985 to 1990. Trautman was born in Buffalo, New York. Trautman died on February 26, 2022, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Buffalo, New York
title: Donald Walter Trautman
